(def input
 (line-seq (io/reader (io/resource "y2017/d9.input"))))

; remove ignore characters
@(def ignored
 (str/replace (first input) #"(\!.)" ""))

; remove garbage characters
@(def groups
 (str/replace ignored #"(\<.*?\>)" ""))

; p1

 (fn [result item]
 (let [score (:score result)
 total (:total result)]
 (if (= item \{)
 {:score (inc score) :total (+ score total)}
 (if (= item \})
 {:score (dec score) :total total}
 result))))
 {:score 1 :total 0}

 groups)", :offset 268, :ns "advent_of_code.y2017.d9"} {:command "(ns advent_of_code.y2017.d7
 (:require [clojure.java.io :as io]
 [clojure.string :as str]))

(def input
 (line-seq (io/reader (io/resource "y2017/d7.input"))))

(defn ->name
 [str]
 (first (str/split str #"\s\(")))

(defn ->weight
 [str]
 (Integer. (str/replace (last (str/split str #"\s\(")) #"\)" "")))

(defn ->tower
 ([program]
 {:name (->name program)
 :weight (->weight program)})
 ([program holdings]
 {:name (->name program)
 :weight (->weight program)
 :holdings (str/split holdings #",\s+")}))

(defn parse
 [line]
 (apply ->tower (str/split line #" -> ")))

(defn parent?
 [name holdings]
 (some #(= name %) holdings))

(defn find-parent
 [tower towers]
 (first (filter #(parent? (:name tower) (:holdings %)) towers)))

@(def towers (map parse input))

(defn find-bottom
 [tower towers]
 (let [parent (find-parent tower towers)]
 (if (empty? parent)
 tower
 (recur parent towers))))

;; p1
(find-bottom (first towers) towers)

 (:require [clojure.java.io :as io]
 [clojure.string :as str]
 [clojure.set :as cset]))

(def input
 (line-seq (io/reader (io/resource "y2017/d7.input"))))

(defn ->name
 [str]
 (first (str/split str #"\s\(")))

(defn ->weight
 [str]
 (Integer. (str/replace (last (str/split str #"\s\(")) #"\)" "")))

(defn ->tower
 ([program]
 {:name (->name program)
 :weight (->weight program)})
 ([program holdings]
 {:name (->name program)
 :weight (->weight program)
 :holdings (str/split holdings #",\s+")}))

(defn parse
 [line]
 (apply ->tower (str/split line #" -> ")))

@(def towers (map parse input))

;; p1 solved by Set Operation
(defn roots
 [coll]
 (reduce
 (fn [roots tower] (conj roots (:name tower)))
 #{}
 coll))

(defn leafs
 [coll]
 (reduce
 (fn [leafs tower] (apply conj leafs (:holdings tower)))
 #{}
 coll))

(cset/difference
 (roots towers)
 (leafs towers))", :offset 964, :ns "user"} {:command "(defn roots
